29 #include <opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp>

31 
32 void prl::binarizeNiblack(
33  cv::Mat& inputImage, cv::Mat& outputImage,
34  int windowSize,
35  double thresholdCoefficient,
36  int morphIterationCount)
37 {
38  if (inputImage.empty())
39  {
40  throw std::invalid_argument("Input image for binarization is empty");
41  }
42 
43  if (!((windowSize > 1) && ((windowSize % 2) == 1)))
44  {
45  throw std::invalid_argument("Window size must satisfy the following condition: \
46  ( (windowSize > 1) && ((windowSize % 2) == 1) ) ");
47  }
48 
49  if (inputImage.channels() != 1)
50  {
51  cv::cvtColor(inputImage, inputImage, CV_BGR2GRAY);
52  }
53 
54  const int usedFloatType = CV_64FC1;
55 
57  int w = std::min(windowSize, std::min(inputImage.cols, inputImage.rows));;
58  int wSqr = w * w;
59  double wSqrBack = 1.0 / static_cast<double>(wSqr);
60  const double k = thresholdCoefficient;
61  //const double R = 128;
62  //const double RBack = 1.0 / R;
63 
65  cv::copyMakeBorder(inputImage, inputImage, w / 2, w / 2, w / 2, w / 2, cv::BORDER_REPLICATE);
66  cv::Rect processingRect(w / 2, w / 2, inputImage.cols - w, inputImage.rows - w);
67 
68  cv::Mat integralImage;
69  cv::Mat integralImageSqr;
70 
72  integral(inputImage, integralImage, integralImageSqr, usedFloatType);
74  integralImage = integralImage(cv::Rect(1, 1, integralImage.cols - 1, integralImage.rows - 1));
76  integralImageSqr =
77  integralImageSqr(cv::Rect(1, 1, integralImageSqr.cols - 1, integralImageSqr.rows - 1));
78 
80  cv::Mat localMeanValues(integralImage.size() - processingRect.size(), usedFloatType);
81 
83  cv::Mat localMeanFilterKernel = cv::Mat::zeros(w, w, usedFloatType);
84  localMeanFilterKernel.at<double>(0, 0) = wSqrBack;
85  localMeanFilterKernel.at<double>(w - 1, 0) = -wSqrBack;
86  localMeanFilterKernel.at<double>(w - 1, w - 1) = wSqrBack;
87  localMeanFilterKernel.at<double>(0, w - 1) = -wSqrBack;
89  cv::filter2D(integralImage(processingRect), localMeanValues, usedFloatType,
90  localMeanFilterKernel, cv::Point(-1, -1), 0.0, cv::BORDER_REFLECT);
91 
93  cv::Mat localMeanValuesSqr = localMeanValues.mul(localMeanValues); // -V678
94 
96  cv::Mat localWeightedSumsFilterKernel = localMeanFilterKernel;
97 
98  cv::Mat localDevianceValues;
99 
101  cv::filter2D(integralImageSqr(processingRect), localDevianceValues, usedFloatType,
102  localWeightedSumsFilterKernel);
103 
104  localDevianceValues -= localMeanValuesSqr;
105  cv::sqrt(localDevianceValues, localDevianceValues);
106 
108  cv::Mat thresholdsValues = localMeanValues + k * localDevianceValues;
109  thresholdsValues.convertTo(thresholdsValues, CV_8UC1);
110 
112  outputImage = inputImage(processingRect) > thresholdsValues;
113 
115  if (morphIterationCount > 0)
116  {
117  cv::dilate(outputImage, outputImage, cv::Mat(), cv::Point(-1, -1), morphIterationCount);
118  cv::erode(outputImage, outputImage, cv::Mat(), cv::Point(-1, -1), morphIterationCount);
119  }
120  else
121  {
122  if (morphIterationCount < 0)
123  {
124  cv::erode(outputImage, outputImage, cv::Mat(), cv::Point(-1, -1), -morphIterationCount);
125  cv::dilate(outputImage, outputImage, cv::Mat(), cv::Point(-1, -1), -morphIterationCount);
126  }
127  }
128 }
